name: Blobby (itch) (Bebs)
description:
Blobby (a blob named Bobby in an obby) is a game about life, as a blob.

The main component of the game is the rewind buttons, they are however broken, but supposed to bring to blob back in time 2.5 seconds. 

Can you complete all level?

PS: After installing game you may have to select the correct resolution, to do that go to the setting (click the icon in the top right corner) and click on the dropdown under the "reset progress"-button. If you have questions or troubles comment them, and I'll try to help. Have fun!
